About me

I'm a Senior Software Engineer with over 5 years of experience in web development. I have worked on multiple projects and have a good understanding of the web development process, and the best practices in web development. My main focus is on the front end, but I have also worked on the back end of projects. I have worked with a variety of technologies, including ReactJS, NextJS, Zustand, Node, Express, TypeScript, and more.

My pastimes include reading, playing video games, and watching movies. I also enjoy learning new things, and I am always looking for new opportunities to learn and grow.
